channel.title: Victor Guzman - Full Stack Developer
channel.description: Professional curriculum vitae and portfolio of Victor Guzman, a Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in Node.js, React.js, AWS, and modern web technologies.

item.title: Full Stack Engineer at NTT - Bank Report Generation System
item.description: Currently working as Full Stack Engineer at NTT (July 2024 - Present). Implemented a complex bank report generation system handling dozens of fields with external API concurrency and timeout management. Designed AWS Lambda functions with SQS batch execution, DynamoDB integration, and WebSocket notifications for real-time user feedback.

item.title: Full Stack Developer at Asesoftware - SaaS & Microservices
item.description: Worked as Full Stack Developer at Asesoftware (June 2022 - July 2024). Architected Subscriptions SaaS product with subscription management and automated billing. Developed robust backend microservices with NestJS and client with React.js. Implemented microfrontend solution to optimize logistics system for Sodimac HomeCenter. Built CI/CD infrastructure with Serverless and GitFlow for AWS deployment. Led 2 software development collaborators and achieved Top 10 recognition in national Mintic hackathon.

item.title: Full Stack Developer at Muebles Jamar - Mobile & Admin Portal
item.description: Worked as Full Stack Developer at Muebles Jamar (May 2021 - January 2022). Developed and maintained REST APIs using Node.js, Express.js, Ruby On Rails, and Java. Migrated Java API RESTful services to Node.js and Ruby on Rails. Built company's administrative portal from ground up with Node.js and React.js. Proposed and developed mobile application for sales force optimization. Created PL/SQL functions consumed by business APIs and ensured business continuity with legacy system support.

item.title: Financial Platform Development - Tejido Digital
item.description: Architected and developed a financial platform module for quotes, purchase orders, and payment orders management at Tejido Digital. Implemented microservice for automated email notifications using Amazon SES, Nodemailer, and Handlebars templates. Developed frontend interface with React 18 for financial operations and order management.

item.title: Advanced Technical Expertise in Modern Web Technologies
item.description: Proficient in Frontend (React.js, Next.js 14, TypeScript), Backend (Node.js, NestJS, Express.js), Cloud & DevOps (AWS Lambda, SQS, DynamoDB, Terraform, CI/CD), and Databases (MySQL, PL/SQL). Specialized in microservices architecture, WebSocket real-time communication, SQL optimization, and comprehensive testing strategies with Jest.

item.title: Systems Engineer - Universidad Simón Bolívar
item.description: Bachelor's degree in Systems Engineering from Universidad Simón Bolívar (2016-2021). Strong foundation in computer science, software engineering principles, and information technology.

item.title: Professional Contact Information
item.description: Connect with Victor Guzman: Phone +57 3002017402, Email victorguzber@gmail.com, LinkedIn linkedin.com/in/victorguzber, GitHub github.com/victorguz. Available for new opportunities and collaborations in Full Stack Development, AWS Cloud Architecture, and Financial Systems.
